name: Jerry Trimble Helicopters
about: Jerry Trimble Helicopters, based in McMinnville, Oregon, is a renowned flight school specializing in high-quality primary and advanced helicopter training, particularly in the Robinson R-22 and R-44. Founded by Jerry Trimble, the school has a rich history dating back to the early 1980s and is known for its personalized, one-on-one instruction. With a fleet that includes various Robinson helicopters and fixed-wing aircraft, JTH offers comprehensive training from private pilot licenses to ATP check-rides. The school is committed to providing an economical and supportive learning environment, including student housing options. Jerry Trimble Helicopters also offers commercial operations, aircraft rentals, maintenance, and sales services, ensuring a holistic approach to aviation education and career development. The school's family-style atmosphere and dedication to helping students secure their first flying jobs set it apart in the industry.
